thread.title_full: American Pie’s Chuck ‘the Sherminator’ Sherman is now fit AF

author: Rebecca Lewis
title: American Pie’s Chuck ‘the Sherminator’ Sherman is now fit AF
text:
The Sherminator (Picture: Universal Pictures) Chuck Sherman was the catalyst for the entire American Pie series, a ‘nerd’ who slept with an attractive girl at a house party leading to Jim, Chris, Kevin, Finch and Stifler set out on their own mission to lose their virginity before prom.
WATCH: This Ryan Reynolds and Jake Gyllenhaal interview goes totally off the rails The entire joke was that Sherman – or the Sherminator – was a massive dork with ginger greasy hair, acne, and an awful dress sense but fast forward nearly 20 years and damn, the Sherminator can get it.
Actor Chris Owens, now 36, has been sharing pictures of his life in Hollywood on Instagram and guys, Chris is really really hot.
Chris Owen in 2012 (Picture: FilmMagic) Here he is proving how sporty and active he is:
Casually showing off my new bicycle. #matteblack #cycling #6ku #stockbike #cantwaitforupgrades #singlespeed 
A post shared by Chris Owen (@callmechrisowen) on Apr 14, 2015 at 8:39pm PDT 
He can also do brooding:
Impromptu photo shoot during celebration of the half way mark of shooting. Thank you! @aleetet #blackandwhite #headshot #iwishialwayslookedthiscool #allthatjam 
A post shared by Chris Owen (@callmechrisowen) on Aug 6, 2014 at 10:33am PDT 
He’s also funny ladies!
Checkmate. #oryanandmike #wedding #chessplay #extrapiecesontheboard 
A post shared by Chris Owen (@callmechrisowen) on Oct 25, 2014 at 7:36pm PDT 
More: Film Terminator won't be back: Sixth installment of the franchise has reportedly been pulled 
Everyone’s fave BFFs Ian McKellen and Patrick Stewart snog at Empire Awards 
Is this the 'first shot' of Luke Skywalker ever taken? Mark Hamill thinks so 
And really into the outdoors:
Rock hoppin' #winterfashion 
A post shared by Chris Owen (@callmechrisowen) on Jan 3, 2017 at 12:10pm PST
